game_description: Cardo Tour is an exciting, futuristic time-traveling adventure for all ages in the heart of Jerusalemâ€™s Old City where you can relive the history of the ancient Cardo with the power of Augmented Reality technology. Journey through time, meet captivating characters, see age-old stones come to life and hear voices from the distant past reveal centuries-old secrets.
review_1: A great way to explore cultural heritage and history with this amazing story based VR experience
